name: The Sleepless Night
description:
Welcome to The Sleepless Night coffee shop, where the all-nighters come to take their night coffee! In this 2D coffee making simulator, you play as a  barista who own a famous coffee shop that is open all night for the Nighters. Your goal is to learn how to make the perfect cup of coffee while keeping up with the fast-paced environment of the shop. The Sleepless Night coffee is a popular coffee shop, so you'll have to work quickly and efficiently to keep up with the demand.

With colorful graphics, fun gameplay, and a cozy soundtrack, The Sleepless Night coffee is the perfect game for coffee lovers and casual gamers alike. Are you ready to brew some perfect cups of coffee?
